DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Extension Trial Assess Safety Long-Term Treatment Rotigotine Early-Stage Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label extension randomize , double-blind , placebo- ropinirole-controlled SP513 trial assess efficacy safety tolerability Rotigotine patch subject early-stage idiopathic Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete six month maintenance treatment SP513 doubleblind trial Subjects ongoing serious adverse event SP513 doubleblind trial assess related study medication
